channel.title: NLP on Zelong's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in NLP on Zelong's Blog

item.title: Google Research: Differentiable Search Index
item.description: This paper from Google Research shows us how a Transformer can be utilized to “remember” the indexing of documents via a seq2seq fashion of training and decoding.

item.title: A Search Engine for Academic Computer VisionÂ Papers
item.description: We built a new search engine for papers published on ICCV and CVPR in recent years, which has been deployed on AWS and can be accessed via this link. Full code is available on our Github.

item.title: A Survey on Rule Learning in Text Mining
item.description: A short review of some recent researches on logic reasoning.
